text: Nervus opticus Zacharias Traber (1611–1678) was an Austrian Jesuit. He dedicated himself to studies on optics. ==Works== * ==References== ==External links== * Zacharias Traber (1675) Nervus opticus sive tractatus theoricus - digital facsimile from the Linda Hall Library Category:Optical physicists Category:17th-century Jesuits Category:1611 births Category:1678 deaths
title: Zacharias Traber
